events.name: EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The four scenarios considered for EV battery supply chain configuration.
events.description: The four scenarios considered for EV battery supply chain configuration.

events.name: Scenario A
events.wd_description: The Advanced Warehouse is located 20 km away from the plant.
events.description: The Advanced Warehouse is located 20 km away from the plant.

events.name: Scenario B
events.wd_description: The Advanced Warehouse is located inside the production site.
events.description: The Advanced Warehouse is located inside the production site.

events.name: Scenario C
events.wd_description: Batteries coming from the Advance Warehouse are downloaded from trucks and directly sent to the production line.
events.description: Batteries coming from the Advance Warehouse are downloaded from trucks and directly sent to the production line.

events.name: Scenario D
events.wd_description: The supplier plant is located about 2,000 km away from the production plant.
events.description: The supplier plant is located about 2,000 km away from the production plant.

events.name: Space Constraints in Scenario B
events.description: Scenario B is cheaper because the Advanced Warehouse is inside the production site, requiring only a 1 km trip. However, it faces space constraints, needing redesign of the plant layout to host the new warehouse.
